gen:link.msg:message: `AccruedIncome` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTradeOtherReceivablesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_AccruedIncome')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTradeOtherReceivablesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_AccruedIncome return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTradeOtherReceivablesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTradeOtherReceivablesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTradeOtherReceivablesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTradeOtherReceivablesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
